Package org.kiji.schema.mapreduce

Kiji map-reduce utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
KijiMutation An output operation from a Kiji map-reduce job.
 

Class Summary
ContextKijiTableWriter ContextKijiTableWriter is a KijiTableWriter used to perform mutations to a Kiji table from within a Hadoop mapper or reducer.
DistributedCacheJars Utility class for dealing with Java JAR files and the hadoop distributed cache.
HTableInputFormat An InputFormat for MapReduce jobs over HBase HTables.
HTableOutputFormat<K> An output format that writes to the HBase table underlying a Kiji table.
KijiDelete KijiDeletes are used to delete rows or specific columns of a row from Kiji Tables.
KijiIncrement KijiIncrements are used to increment counters in a Kiji table from within a map-reduce job.
KijiOutput KijiOutput is a class used to wrap KijiMutations.
KijiPut KijiPuts are used to build writes to a Kiji table.
KijiTableInputFormat An InputFormat for MapReduce jobs over Kiji tables.
KijiTableInputFormat.KijiTableRecordReader Record reader that KijiTableInputFormat uses.
KijiTableOutputFormat<K> Used to write KijiMutations to Kiji tables.
KijiTableOutputFormat.KijiTableRecordWriter<K> A RecordWriter for writing KijiMutations to a KijiTable.
 

Enum Summary
KijiDelete.KijiDeleteScope Enum used while creating KijiDelete to specify the scope of the operation, i.e.
 

Package org.kiji.schema.mapreduce Description

Kiji map-reduce utilities.

This package provides support for building map-reduce jobs that read from and/or write to a Kiji table. For reading from Kiji, use KijiTableInputFormat. For writing to kiji use KijiTableOutputFormat.
